text: (kuhprin karanamaka avarkalukku vitikkappata ventiya) vetanaiyai oru kurittakalam varai nam pirpatuttinal"atait tatuttatu yatu?" Enru avarkal niccayamaka (elanamakak) ketparkal. Avarkalukku vetanai varum nalil avarkalai vittum (atu) tatukkappatatu enpataiyum, etai avarkal parikacam ceytu kontiruntarkalo atu avarkalaic culntu kollum enpataiyum avarkal arintu kolla ventama
